gist.headline: Fresh ink on the front page
gist.blurb: The automated scribe has updated the README with the latest happenings from the hive.
gist.summary: Automated update to the README.md latest news section by the bot.
gist.impact: Keeps the project landing page synchronized with recent changes and announcements.
gist.visual_concept: The monitor robot acting as a town crier or newsie, pasting a fresh poster onto a lime green bulletin board while the bee watches.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the chunky robot mascot pasting a new paper onto a wooden bulletin board. The cute bee mascot hovers nearby reading it. Lime green (#ecf874) and soft pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi 8-bit aesthetic like Stardew Valley.
